title: Nenachapadi Nenachapadi Lyrics Kadhalar Dhinam
stanzas: <div>Nenachapadi Nenachapadi Song Lyrics Kadhalar Dhinam

Nenachapadi nenachapadi
mappila amainjathadi

Nenachapadi nenachapadi
mappila amainjathadi
unakkena pirandhavano
uyirudan kalandhaano
unakkena pirandhaano
uyirudan kalandhaano

Nenachapadi nenachapadi
manapponnu amainjathadi
unakkena pirandhalo
uyirudan kalandhaalo
unakkena pirandhalo
uyirudan kalandhaalo

en tholgale thottam endru
ennaalume thoththi kollum
kaatrallava nee en kannae

kalyana naalil maalai kolla
kannaalanin poonjolai sella
andha vanam nandhavanam aagum.

marudhaani kolam pottu
mani kaiyil valaiyal potu
indha rojavukku roja poo
ne soottu. (2)

un kanvan naalai
thaan varavendum.
uyir kadhal nenjaye
thara vendum.

mana pandhal thoranam
naan poda
manavaalanodu un
kai kooda.
un thandhai ullam
thaan oonjal aada.

kadhal enum sollai
naanum sollavilllai
solla vandha neram
kadhal endhan kaiyil illai.(2)

vazhvu thandha vallal
vaangi kondu poga
vazhthu solla naanum
vandhen kangal eeramaaga

endrum enadhu kannile
un bimbam.
unai enni vazhvathe
en inbam (2)

ingu nee sirikka
naan paarthaale
en kadhal vazhum.
nee vazhga nalamaaga
nee vazhga nalamaaga

Nenachapadi nenachapadi
mappila amainjathadi
unakkena pirandhavano
uyirudan kalandhaano
unakkena pirandhaano
uyirudan kalandhaano

Nenachapadi nenachapadi
manapponnu amainjathadi
unakkena pirandhalo
uyirudan kalandhaalo
unakkena pirandhalo
uyirudan kalandhaalo

alli vizhi oaram
manjanathai theetti
andhi vannam pinnal
meedhu thazhi malar sootti(2)

aadhi mudhal andham
aabaram pootti
annam ival maedai vandhal
minnal mugam kaatti

ketti melam kottida
manapennai thottu
thaali kattinaan maapillai. (2)

indha aezhai nenjamum
nee vazha endrum
pookkal thoovum.
nee vazhga nalamaaga

Nenachapadi nenachapadi
mappila amainjathadi
unakkena pirandhavano
uyirudan kalandhaano
unakkena pirandhaano
uyirudan kalandhaano

Nenachapadi nenachapadi
manapponnu amainjathadi
unakkena pirandhalo
uyirudan kalandhaalo
unakkena pirandhalo
uyirudan kalandhaalo

marudhaani kolam pottu
mani kaiyil valaiyal potu
indha rojavukku
roja poo ne soottu. (2)
